AS Muhanga vs Rayon Sports

AS Muhanga 1-3 Rayon Sports

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:21

Rayon Sports ikomeje gushaka igikombe

Gutsinda uyu mukino bihesheje Rayon Sports kugira amanota 54 ku mwanya wa kabiri muri shampiyona, aho isigaye irushwa amanota atatu na APR FC ya mbere mu gihe habura imikino itandatu ngo shampiyona irangire.

AS Muhanga yo igumye ku mwanya wa 10 n'amanota 29.

Mwakoze cyane abo twabanye kuri uyu mukino, tuzasubire ku munsi wa 25 wa shampiyona.

17:19

Umukino urarangiye: Rayon Sports itahanye amanota y'umunsi

Umusifuzi Mukansanga Salima ahushye mu ifirimbi avuga ko umukino urangiye. Rayon Sports iwutsinze ku bitego 3-1.

17:18

90+2' Coup-franc ya AS Muhanga

Iradukunda Eric 'Radu' akiniye nabi Niyongira Dany mu rubuga rwa Rayon Sports. Iri kosa rirahanwe ariko umupira usubira ku bakinnyi ba Rayon Sports.

17:16

90' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane Uwikunda Samuel yerekanye iminota itatu y'inyongera mbere y'uko uyu mukino urangira.

17:13

87' Igitego cya AS Muhanga

Ku mupira wari umaze kurenzwa na Mutsinzi Ange ukajya muri koruneri, AS Muhanga ibonye igitego cy'impozamarira gitsinzwe na Niyongira Dany.

17:11

85' Rayon Sports iri gusatira bikomeye

Rayon Sports ikomeje gushaka igitego cya kane, aho yashyize igitutu gikomeye ku bakinnyi b'inyuma ba AS Muhanga. Jules Ulimwengu na Mugisha Gilbert ni bamwe mu bari gusatira bikomeye.

17:09

83' Umukino uhagaze gato: AS Muhanga irasimbuje

Myugariro wa AS Muhanga, Himbaza Jacques ajyanwe hanze ku ngobyi nyuma yo kugira imvune, aho ahise anasimburwa na Niyokwizerwa Celestin

17:05

79' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Mugheni Fabrice asimbuwe na Tuyishimire Eric 'Congolais' ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports isoje gukora impinduka muri uyu mukino.

17:03

77' Gusimbuza kwa AS Muhanga

Niyongira Danny yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Bigirimana Shaban ku ruhande rwa AS Muhanga.

17:02

75' Coup-franc ya AS Muhanga

AS Muhanga ibonye coup-franc ahagana muri koruneri itewe na Hakundukize adolphe umupira ukurwaho n'abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports.

17:00

73' Igitego cya gatatu cya Rayon Sports

Rayon Sports ibonye Coup-franc inyuma y'urubuga rw'amahina ubwo Fabien yakiniraga nabi Ulimwengu. Ihanwe na Gilbert wari kumwe na Mutsinzi, umupira ugonga urukuta, usubijwe mu izamu ukurwamo na Patrick, Sefu ahita ashyira umupira mu izamu.

16:56

70' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Michael Sarpong wagowe n'uyu mukino asimbuwe na Bukuru ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports.

16:52

66' Mazimpaka Andre arokoye Rayon Sports ubugira kabiri

AS Muhanga iri gusatira bikomeye muri iyi minota. Habimana Youssuf na Hakundukize adolphe bateye amashoti abiri akomeye mu izamu akurwamo n'umunyezamu Mazimpaka kuri ubu uryamye hasi aho ari kuvurwa nyuma yo gushyira muri koruneri umupira wari utewe n'uyu kapiteni wa AS Muhanga.

16:49

63' Manzi Thierry na Rutanga barebeye uyu mukino mu bafana

Kapiteni wa Rayon Sports Manzi Thierry ufite amakarita atatu y'umuhondo na Rutanga Eric bombi ntabwo bakinnye uyu munsi.

16:48

61' Ulimwengu ayoboye abamaze gutsinda ibitego byinshi

Kugeza kuri uyu munota, Jules Ulimwengu ni we umaze gutsinda ibitego byinshi (14) muri shampiyona.

@AzamLeague Top Scorers so far.....

Ulimwengu Jules (Rayon) 14
Hakizimana Muhadjiri (APR FC) 13
Nizeyimana Djuma (SC Kiyovu) 12
Michael Sarpong (Rayon) 11
Bizimana Yannick (Muhanga) 11 pic.twitter.com/RVAziazHc0

— Scout (@scoutrw) April 28, 2019


16:46

58' AS Muhanga ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Umupira mwiza yari aboneye mu rubuga rw'amahina, Bigirimana Shaban ateye mu izamu, uramutenguha ujya hanze. Bwari iburyo bwiza bwari guhza AS Muhanga igitego muri uyu mukino. Iyi kipe iri gukina neza muri iyi minota.

16:44

58' Sarpong ashushije igitego

Niyonzima Olivier Sefu atanze umupira mwiza kuri Michael Sarpong winjiye mu rubuga rw'amahina, ateye ishoti umupira ufatwa na Isingizwe Patrick

16:43

55' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Manishimwe Djabel wari kapiteni kuri uyu mukino, asimbuwe na Mugisha Gilbert ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports.Irambona Eric ni we uhawe igitambaro cya kapiteni

16:39

52' Coup-franc ya AS Muhanga

Yannick Bizimana acomekewe umupira muremure ariruka asiga Mutsinzi Ange umukoreye ikosa. Rihanwe na Adolphe uteye umupira usanga Yannick akozweho na Donkor umusifuzi avuga ko ntacyabaye.

16:35

47' AS Muhanga yashoboraga kwishyura

Bizimana Yannick ahawe umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina, atera ishoti rikomeye rifata umukinnyi wa Rayon Sports, ugarukiye uyu rutahizamu wa AS Muhanga, Habimana Hussein arahagoboka.

16:33

46' Gusimbuza kwa AS Muhanga

Lulihoshi Aksante Dieu Merci yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Ruboneka Jean Bosco wabonye ikarita y'umuhondo mu gice cya mbere.

16:31

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Umusifuzi atangije igice cya kabiri. Rayon Sports itangiye isatira ariko AS Muhanga bisubiza umupira ugeze kuri Bizimana Yannick awamuburwa na Mutsinzi Ange

16:23

Mu yindi mikino:Mukura Victory Sports yatsinze Police FC kugeza ubu

Undi mukino w'umunsi wa 24 wa shampiyona uri kubera kuri Stade Huye, igice cya mbere cyarangiye Mukura Victory Sports yatsinze Police FC igitego 1-0 cya Kubwimana Cedric ku munota wa cyenda w'umukino.

Kuri Stade Umuganda i Rubavu, Etincelles n'Amagaju FC bagiye kuruhuka ari ubusa ku busa.

16:17

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

Mu gihe Mugheni Fabrice yashakaga mugenzi we ahereza umupira, umusifuzi Mukansanga Salima avuze ko igice cya mbere kirangiye. Amakipe yombi agiye kumva inama z'abatoza mbere yo gukina igice cya kabiri.

16:16

44' Igitego cya kabiri cya Rayon Sports

Manishimwe Djabel amanukanye umupira mu ruhande rw'iburyo, yinjira mu rubuga rw'amahina, yubura amaso gato, areba uko abakinnyi ba AS Muhanga bahagaze, awutanga kuri Ulimwengu Jules uhise utsinda igitego cya kabiri muri uyu mukino kikaba icya 14 muri shampiyona.

16:14

42' Bizimanana Yannick ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Rutahizamu wa AS Muhanga yinjiranye umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina, acenga Mutsinzi Ange na Habimana Hussein ku bw'amahirwe ya Rayon Sports Mutsinzi akoraho gato umupira ujya muri koruneri.

16:11

40' AS Muhanga ikunze kwitwara neza ku kibuga

16:08

37' AS Muhanga yatinyutse

Mu gihe umukino ugitangira Rayon Sports yari ku rwego rwo hejuru, AS Muhanga kuri ubu yatinyutse, iranyuzamo na yo igasatira n'ubwo gutera mu izamu biri kuba gake cyane.

16:04

33' Rayon Sports yatsinze umukino umwe mu mikino itatu iheruka gukinira hanze

16:01

30' Abafana bitabiriye n'ubwo Stade ituzuye

16:00

28' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego

Ku mupira ukomeye wari utewe na Manishimwe Djabel, umunyezamu Isingizwe Patrick asohotse neza, awukora ujya muri koruneri itewe ariko umupira wongera gufatwa n'uyu munyezamu wa AS Muhanga.

15:59

27' AS Muhanga yashoboraga gufungura amazamu

Kapiteni wa AS Muhanga Hakundukize Adolphe azamukanye umupira mu ruhande rw'ibumoso, ateye ishoti rikomeye umupira ufatwa na Mazimpaka wari wagezweho na Habimana Youssuf.

15:56

24' Sarpong ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Rutahizamu wa Rayon Sports Michael Sarpong ananiwe gutsindira iyi kipe igitego cya kabiri ku mupira wari uvuye kuri Ulimwengu. Ahise aryama hasi aho ari kwitabwaho n'abaganga, bigaragara ko ahobora kuba agize ikibazo.

15:52

20' Bizimana Yannick ni uwo kwitondera

Uyu rutahizamu ukiri muto wa AS Muhanga, ari gucungirwa hafi na Habimana Hussein ndetse na Mutsinzi Ange. Buri mupira abonye, Rayon Sports baramusatira ari babiri.

15:50

18' Ikarita y'umuhondo kuri AS Muhanga

Ruboneka Jean Bosco wa AS Muhanga akiniye nabi Niyonzima Olivier Sefu wa Rayon Sports, ahabwa ikarita y'umuhondo. Mugheni Fabrice ahannye iri kosa ashaka Sarpong umupira ujya hanze.

15:48

16' Djabel yari ashatse gutungura AS Muhanga

Ku mupira w'umuterekano Rayon Sports yari ibonye, Djabel ahannye ikosa adategereje umusifuzi, umupira awuha Sarpong ushatse kuroba umunyezamu Isingizwe Patrick asohoka neza akoza ikiganza.

15:45

14' Coup-franc ya AS Muhanga

Bigirimana Shabani akiniwe nabi hafi n'izamu rya Rayon Sports, ahannye iri kosa umupira uruhukira mu biganza by'umunyezamu Mazimpaka Andre kugeza ubu utarahura n'akazi gakomeye.

15:44

12' Sarpong akiniwe nabi

Twagirayezu Fabien wa AS Muhanga akiniye nabi Michael Sarpong ikosa rihanwe na Manishimwe Djabel akinana na Mugheni Fabrice, ariko Fabien akiza ikipe ye.

15:42

9' Igitego cya Rayon Sports

Michael sarpong agundaguranye n'abakina inyuma ba AS Muhanga, atanga umupira kuri Jules Ulimwengu ufunguye amazamu ku munota wa cyenda w'umukino. Abakinnyi ba AS Muhanga bibwiraga ko yarayemo, ariko abasifuzi bavuze ko ntacyabaye, bemeza igitego. Ulimwengu agejeje ibitego 13 kugeza ubu, anganya na Muhadjiri.

15:39

7' Bizimana Yannick ahawe gasopo n'umusifuzi

Uyu rutahizamu wa AS Muhanga umaze gutsinda ibitego 11 kugeza ubu, ahawe umupira abanza kuwukora n'ukuboko, umusifuzi Mukansanga amubwira ko niyongera gukora ikosa amuhana.

15:37

5' AS Muhanga igerageje uburyo bugana mu izamu

Ndayishimiye Dieudonne azamukanye umupira ku ruhande rw'iburyo, akinana na Ruboneka Jean Bosco uteye umupira ugana mu izamu ujya hanze.

15:34

3' Djabel ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Ubundi bwumvikane bucye hagati y'abakinnyi b'inyuma ba AS Muhanga. Michael Sarpong agiye mu kirere abuza umunyezamu Isingizwe gufata umupira, usanga Manishimwe Djabel uteye mu izamu, uramutenguha ujya hejuru gato nyuma yo gukorwaho n'umukinnyi wa AS Muhanga.

15:32

1' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego

Twagirayezu Fabien arajijinganyije, Manishimwe Djabel afata umupira mu rubuga rw'amahina, atera mu izamu umunyezamu Isingizwe Patrick awushyira muri koruneri itagize icyo itanga.

15:30

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi Mukansanga Salima atangije umukino. Umupira wa mbere utewe na Michael Sarpong wa Rayon Sports akinana na Niyonzima Olivier Sefu. Rayon Sports itangiye isatira, ku mupira wari uhinduwe na Radu, Sarpong awukozeho ujya hanze.

15:25

Rayon Sports yatsinze umukino uheruka guhuza amakipe yombi

Mu mikino ibanza, Rayon Sports yatsinze AS Muhanga igitego 1-0 cyatsinzwe na Michael Sarpong. Uyu mukinnyi umaze gutsinda ibitego 11 kuri uyu munsi ari mu kibuga, aho afatanya na Ulimwengu Jules umaze gutsinda ibitego 12 muri shampiyona.

15:16

Mu yindi mikino:Mukura Victory Sports na Police FC zigiye guhurira i Huye

Undi mukino ukomeye kuri iki Cyumweru, ugiye guhuza Mukura Victory Sports na Police FC kuri Stade Huye.

Mukura VS ya gatatu ku rutonde rwa shampiyona n'amanota 48 irasabwa gutsinda uyu mukino kugira ngo iguma icyizere cyo guhatanira igikombe cya shampiyona y'uyu mwaka. Gusa, iyi kipe y'i Huye iheruka gutsinda iy'abashinzwe umutekano mu 2011.

Undi mukino urahuza Etincelles FC n'Amagaju FC kuri Stade Ubworoherane.

@MukuraVS iheruka gutsindira @Policefc_Rwanda i Huye mu 2011 igitozwa na Ruremesha Emmanuel. @AzamLeague @FERWAFA pic.twitter.com/aSjBT20kF5

— Scout (@scoutrw) April 28, 2019


14:59

Amakipe yombi akomeje kwishyushya

AS Muhanga na Rayon Sports zombi ziri kwishyushya, abakinnyi b'amakipe yombi bari inyuma y'ikibuga. Uyu mukino uraza kuyoborwa na Mukansanga Salima.

14:53

Rayon Sports igera ku kibuga

14:51

AS Muhanga yiteguye umukino

14:39

Abakinnyi bagiye kubanzamo ku mpande zombi:

Umutoza: Roberto Oliveira.

14:27

Abdou Mbarushimana agiye guhura na Rayon Sports yavuyemo nabi

Nyuma yo kuyitsinda mu 2016, Abdu arongera guhura na Rayon Sports yavuyemo nabi. Muri Gashyantare 2016 nibwo Abdu Mbarushimana yavuye muri Rayon Sports nyuma yo kwigizwayo nâ€™uwari umutoza wâ€™iyi kipe Ivan Minnaert.

Icyo gihe, Abdou Mbarushimana yari muri Rayon Sports guhera mu mwaka wâ€™imikino 2014/15, aho yatangiye ashinzwe iterambere muri iyi kipe nyuma aba Team Manager, ndetse umutoza Minnaert wari wageze muri Rayon Sports mu Ugushyingo, yamwifashishaga muri Coaching Staff ye.

14:26

Rayon Sports igomba kwitonda

Nâ€™ubwo mu mikino yindi ya gicuti yahuje amakipe yombi, Rayon Sports yanyagiye AS Muhanga ibitego 6-0 na 2-0 ndetse Rayon Sports ikaba yaranatsinze igitego 1-0 mu mukino ubanza, AS Muhanga yatsinze umukino uheruka guhuriza amakipe yombi hano i Muhanga ku igitego 1-0, bihesha APR FC gutwara shampiyona ya 2015/16.

Uyu mukino wa shampiyona wabaye tariki ya 7 Nyakanga 2016, Rayon Sports itsindwa igifite imikino yâ€™ibirarane bitatu byashoboraga kuyihesha shampiyona, icyizere kiyoyokera i Muhanga.

@AsMuhanga yatsinze @rayon_sports igitego 1-0 mu mukino wa shampiyona uheruka guhuriza amakipe yombi i Muhanga, bihesha APR FC igikombe cya 2015/16. pic.twitter.com/4W5zqiIb3F

14:16

Ikaze kuri Stade ya Muhanga

Tubahaye ikaze kuri Stade ya Muhanga igiye kuberaho umukino wâ€™umunsi wa 24 wa shampiyona AS Muhanga yakiriyemo Rayon Sports kuri iki Cyumweru. Rayon Sports irasabwa gutsinda kugira ngo ikomeze gusatira APR FC yaraye yongeye gushyiramo ikinyuranyo cyâ€™amanota atandatu ubwo yatsindaga Bugesera FC ibitego 3-0. AS Muhanga iri ku mwanya wa 10 nâ€™amanota 29.

@AsMuhanga irongera gucungura @aprfcofficial3 ?
